short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button to the PKP websites to add the trip to your calendar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you tired of checking your mailbox to see when your train leaves, what is your wagon number or seat number? Me too. This extension allows you to easily save all this information into your calendar in short and convenient form. Works for PKP Intercity and Koleje Mazowieckie only currently.
